header.name: Idempotency-Key
header.description: A unique key provided in the header to ensure the request is processed only once, preventing duplicate operations on retries

header.name: Authorization
header.description: The bearer token or credentials included in the header for user authentication and authorization

header.name: X-API-Key
header.description: The API key used for authenticating the request, passed in the request header

path.name: jobId
path.description: The unique identifier for the job to be canceled, provided as a path parameter

body.name: job
body.description: The primary job object containing all relevant details and status information.

items.name: id
items.description: The unique identifier associated with a specific resource or job instance

items.name: type
items.description: The classification or category type assigned to the job

items.name: status
items.description: The current state of the job after the cancellation attempt, such as canceled, in progress, or failed

items.name: policyId
items.description: The identifier of the policy applied to the job for assessment or processing

items.name: input
items.description: The original data or parameters submitted when initiating the job

items.name: progress
items.description: The current progress of the job expressed as a percentage from 0 to 100

items.name: percent
items.description: The percentage value indicating completion or progress of a given task or evaluation

items.name: stage
items.description: The current processing stage of the job, such as queued, running, or completed

items.name: etaSeconds
items.description: The estimated time remaining for job completion, expressed in seconds

items.name: result
items.description: The final outcome or result produced by the job.

items.name: summary
items.description: A brief overview or synopsis of the job’s results or status

items.name: decision
items.description: The outcome determined for the job cancellation request, indicating whether the cancellation was successful or not

items.name: maxScore
items.description: The highest possible score achievable within the job’s scoring system

items.name: flaggedCategories
items.description: A list of categories flagged during the job evaluation process, highlighting areas of concern or interest
[Please provide context or rename parameter for accurate description]

items.name: scores
items.description: A collection of numerical values representing the evaluation metrics associated with the job
[Please provide context or rename parameter for accurate description]

items.name: category
items.description: The classification category assigned to the job or its content

items.name: score
items.description: A numerical value representing the evaluation or relevance of the job outcome

items.name: threshold
items.description: The minimum score required to trigger specific actions or decisions within the job processing logic

items.name: status
items.description: The current state of the job after the cancellation attempt, such as canceled, in progress, or failed

items.name: findings
items.description: A collection of detected items, issues, or insights identified during the execution of the job.
A placeholder or index key, typically representing the first element in an array or list.

items.name: type
items.description: The classification or category type assigned to the job

items.name: message
items.description: A descriptive message providing additional context or information about the response or error

items.name: confidence
items.description: The confidence level expressed as a decimal between 0 and 1, indicating the certainty of the decision made

items.name: timestamp
items.description: The exact date and time when the event or status update was recorded in ISO 8601 format

items.name: startMs
items.description: The timestamp marking the start of the job execution in milliseconds since epoch

items.name: endMs
items.description: The timestamp marking the end of the job execution in milliseconds since epoch

items.name: region
items.description: A defined area or section within an image, video frame, or dataset relevant to the job.

items.name: x
items.description: The x-coordinate of a point or bounding box within a two-dimensional space.

items.name: y
items.description: The y-coordinate of a point or bounding box within a two-dimensional space.

items.name: w
items.description: The width dimension of a visual element or bounding box, measured in pixels.

items.name: h
items.description: The height dimension of a visual element or bounding box, measured in pixels.

items.name: frameIndex
items.description: The zero-based index of a video frame referenced within the job data.

items.name: textSpan
items.description: The specific span or range of text associated with the response, often defined by start and end indices.

items.name: start
items.description: The starting position or timestamp of the relevant segment within the job's data.

items.name: end
items.description: The ending position or timestamp of the relevant segment within the job's data.

items.name: snippet
items.description: A short excerpt or segment of text or media returned as part of the job results.

items.name: labels
items.description: An array of descriptive tags or categories assigned to a segment or item within the job data.
A placeholder or index key, typically representing the first element in an array or list.

items.name: transcript
items.description: The full or partial transcription of audio or video content processed by the job.
A placeholder or index key, typically representing the first element in an array or list.

items.name: startMs
items.description: The start time of a segment expressed in milliseconds from the beginning of the media or dataset.

items.name: endMs
items.description: The end time of a segment expressed in milliseconds from the beginning of the media or dataset.

items.name: text
items.description: Raw or processed text content associated with the job output.

items.name: speaker
items.description: Identifier or label representing the speaker associated with a segment in audio or transcript data.

items.name: words
items.description: An array of individual words identified within a transcript segment.
A placeholder or index key, typically representing the first element in an array or list.

items.name: startMs
items.description: The start time of a segment expressed in milliseconds from the beginning of the media or dataset.

items.name: endMs
items.description: The end time of a segment expressed in milliseconds from the beginning of the media or dataset.

items.name: word
items.description: A single word extracted or identified within the transcript or text data.

items.name: confidence
items.description: A numerical value representing the confidence level or accuracy of the returned result, typically between 0 and 1.

items.name: outputFiles
items.description: List of files generated as output from the job execution.
An indexed element, typically representing the first item in a list or array related to the job response.

items.name: id
items.description: A unique identifier assigned to a segment, item, or job instance.

items.name: status
items.description: Indicates the current state of the job after the cancellation attempt, such as 'cancelled', 'in_progress', or 'failed'.

items.name: purpose
items.description: A description of the intended use or goal of the job or a specific data segment.

items.name: filename
items.description: The name of the file associated with the job, including its extension.

items.name: mimeType
items.description: The MIME type of files or data associated with the job.

items.name: sizeBytes
items.description: The total size of the job payload in bytes.

items.name: checksumSha256
items.description: SHA-256 hash checksum used to verify the integrity of job-related data.

items.name: storage
items.description: Details about the storage mechanism or location used for job artifacts.

items.name: provider
items.description: The external service or system responsible for processing the job.

items.name: bucket
items.description: The storage bucket where job-related files or data are stored.

items.name: key
items.description: A unique identifier representing the resource associated with the job.

items.name: region
items.description: The geographical region where the job is being processed or stored.

items.name: createdAt
items.description: Timestamp marking when the job was initially created, in ISO 8601 format.

items.name: expiresAt
items.description: Timestamp indicating when the job or its results expire, in ISO 8601 format.

items.name: metadata
items.description: Key-value pairs containing user-defined metadata associated with the job.

items.name: reportUrl
items.description: URL linking to a detailed report or summary of the job execution.

items.name: error
items.description: Error object containing code and message describing any failure encountered.

items.name: code
items.description: A machine-readable status or error code associated with the job outcome.

items.name: message
items.description: Human-readable message providing additional information about the job status.

items.name: retriable
items.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the job can be retried upon failure.

items.name: createdAt
items.description: Timestamp marking when the job was initially created, in ISO 8601 format.

items.name: updatedAt
items.description: Timestamp indicating the last time the job was updated, in ISO 8601 format.

items.name: meta
items.description: A collection of additional, non-standard information or attributes related to the job.

items.name: message
items.description: Human-readable message providing additional information about the job status.

items.name: details
items.description: Additional context or information providing insight into the job status or errors.

items.name: requestId
items.description: Server-generated unique identifier for tracking and support purposes.
